CasaOS LXC

CasaOS is a software that aims to make it easy for users to create a personal cloud system at home. It uses the Docker ecosystem to provide a simple, user-friendly experience for managing various applications and services.

ðŸ›ˆ If the LXC is created Privileged, the script will automatically set up USB passthrough.

To create a new Proxmox VE CasaOS LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/casaos.sh)"

âš¡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU âš¡

CasaOS Interface: IP
